article_title: Michele Bachmann: IRS Scandal Big Enough to Take Down Obama's Presidency
article_text:
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER





Friday on Fox News Channel’s “On The Record,” Rep. Michele Bachmann (R-MN) told host Greta Van Susteren that the Obama administration’s actions in the IRS scandal could be “big enough it could bring down the presidency.” SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

The outgoing-Minnesota congresswoman and former tax law attorney said, “Well, there is no question this is a scandal. It’s a scandal of epic proportions. Big enough it could bring down the presidency. The only thing that’s phony are all of the denials coming out of the White House.”

“As a former tax official, if I would have done that as an employee of the IRS, I would have been referred to the Justice Department, the criminal division,” she added. “I would have not only lost my job, Greta, I would have been subject to a felony of five years hard time, in a federal penitentiary. That’s what we are talking about. that’s how serious this is the. IRS has broken laws and the american people need a redress of this grievance.”

Follow Pam Key On Twitter @pamkeyNEN
